subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The hard part will come in the fall, when Isiah Thomas will have to establish a lineup and a rotation and turn the Knicks into something they had no hope of becoming last season — a playoff team.
snippet: The hard part will come in the fall, when Isiah Thomas will have to establish a lineup and a rotation and turn the Knicks into something they had no hope of becoming last season — a playoff team.
